website_summaries.verdict: With an 11-hour battery life, these wireless earbuds will easily last through the day. Convenient behind-the-neck design.
pros: Surprisingly good audio quality for music or spoken word
Customers often forget they're wearing these headphones due to the comfortable design
The magnetic earbuds stick together when not in use
cons: Controls on the back of the neck are somewhat awkward

customer_reviews.title: Horribly built, crappy bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair, and all 3 have eventually had to be replaced due to coming apart at the same spot. This pair in particular after only 3 weeks. Aside from terrible build quality, the bluetooth range is atrocious. I dont dare put my phone in my pants pocket or purse. It must be within the same foot or so of height, or else struggles to stay connected. (Galaxy S8) What really sucks for me is how much I need this style earbud, as I am one of many who cannot use the noise canceling in-ear style dominating the market. I'm running out of options.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great until they suddenly stopped working
customer_reviews.text: These headphones had great sound quality and the battery was decent (lasted all day.) Like most devices, the battery life did shorten over time with conatant use. Unfortunately, my headphone just stopped working 4 months after purchase. They do charge but they do not connect to existing paired devices or to any new ones. 1 star rating because Amazon would not let me contact seller for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Defective Plastic_ Don't Waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After two months the plastic started to break like it was already very brittle without being dropped. Two months It wouldn't not even last two months. When I contacted Samsung, they do not cover any defective workmanship. They only cover poor audio.
customer_reviews.author: B A

customer_reviews.title: Just received my wonderful new Samsung Level U headset - with earwax, and hair, and all!
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase a NEW headset, you expect a NEW headset. However, this one came in an open box, with nice curly black hairs (right?!), and ear gels covered in snap. I'll give the seller 48 hours to rectify, before filing. Just nasty. This is my third of these. Use them for work, and they're the best fit, for weirdly shaped ears, like mine. Music is okay; I mainly need them for conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Tholkien

customer_reviews.title: Oohh SNAP!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for 3 months and I literally moved my hair from being tucked in them and I heard a snap. Sadly one side snapped... I guess all thr reviews about the plastic being crap is true. Otherwise the product is fine. Sound quality is ok, very lightweight, and the battery is AMAZING! The battery is the best part. I purchased the warranty but I'm having trouble "using the warranty." Amazon says call Samsung, Samsung says call Amazon. Such a headache. Probably won't purchase again sadly. I think Samsung needs to go back to the drawing board on this one with a different plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tunisia

customer_reviews.title: Bad bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted these headsets to work since they are super comfortable around the neck and in the ears, and they look nice--discrete, and they match my Huawei Mate 20 X perfectly. I was hoping there was a solution for the bad bluetooth connection, but there is not. The one person that responded to my request for advice said they believe these headsets work with Samsung phones only. That just may be the case. At the least, they do not work well with the Huawei Mate 20 X, so I must return them :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: The only thing holding the wires to the hard part of the headset is a small rubber band! Like an afterthought! It looks like a rubber band from dental braces. Not impressed there! 2nd BIG negative, the earbuds are the funky hard kind (like apple) that do NOT fit tight into the ear so ZERO noise cancellation! What good is that? Not impressed by this product even 1 bit!
customer_reviews.author: J. hembd

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time(You have 4 months tops with this headset)
customer_reviews.text: I had this device for 4 months & it just quit working entirely. None of my devices could find it. I put up with sound quality issue because it got better. Reached out to Amazon several times about placing a claim, a week later they sent me an email about the item couldn't be replaced meanwhile Amazon still sales this item!!! Item has not been "Discontinued". So I'm out of a headset. LG was trash but now it's looking like to either fully quit Samsung or just go back crappy customer care with LG headsets. Another L for 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Chrinecia Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if they lasted longer...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to use with his Samsung Galaxy S7. They met his needs & expectations.... At first. After two & a half months, the left earbud just stopped working. There was no sound coming from it. Because this is not one of the newer models, it is no longer covered under warranty thru the manufacturer even though I had just purchased them. We would have been extremely happy with them, had we not had this problem, but when I spend $40 on headphones, I expect them to last longer than 2 & 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST HEADPHONES EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth headphones are poorly MANUFACTURED. THE SOUND IS TERRIBLE. These HEADPHONES ARE A JOKE TO BEGIN WITH. They are flimsy and will end up falling to pieces literally. The earbuds that are connected will come apart from the headphones itself. POORLY MADE AND DESIGNED with ABSOLUTELY NO QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica White

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The quality is similar to apple headphones (the ones that plug in). Any audio I listen to is clear, and the connection is good. Watch out for your pod covers though, cause they tend to fall off really easily, and I've lost most of the ones mine came with cause they pop off just by rubbing on my shirt. I tend to wear these hanging off my neck wherever I go so I often don't find the covers when they come off, however cover replacements are fairly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: There are better low budget Bluetooth headsets available elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought the Samsung U flex on the left, unfortunately I damaged it and all they had left was the Samsung level U. If I had to compare the two I would say the Samsung level U is junk, save your money. This Samsung level U must have been Samsung's 1st generation headset. Just because it says Samsung doesn't always mean it's better especially in this case. I know for a fact you can get no name brand headsets that are better than these. I am referring to the Samsung level U
customer_reviews.author: rayray68

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and really like them. Bought here because I thought I'd lost them. The are a good size, and I hate the noise cancelling ones because every step I take echos in my ears. I also like that if I take them out to have a conversation they just fall to my chest - don't get all tangled like ones that are just wires and don't worry about losing one like airpords. Buttons are easy to use and reach unless I'm wearing a balacava, but nothing is then. I also like the on/off button and sound because I don't have to wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but necessary information is missing from the package
customer_reviews.text: The only instructions included in the package is a quick start guide, which doesn't tell you a lot of necessary information It was difficult to locate the owner's manual online. But, even then it doesn't tell you that you need the Samsung Level app. But this is where the manual is. The app also makes it really easy to pair your device and other operations. Otherwise I have nothing but praise for the headphones. They fit comfortably and securely in the ear. They're designed to keep from sliding out which helps keep the sound quality really high.
customer_reviews.author: laurel mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality.
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought these and has been raving about them ever since, I needed a decent (also discreet) pair of headphones for work. I finally caved in and bought them. I've had them for a while now and they work very well, great sound, not in the way at all (as I have a hands on job). My only complaint would be they don't fit my ears well, but that isn't the makers' fault, as it's hard to find any earbud that fits my ear (and trust me I've tried them all). My mom says hers fit in her ear perfectly and they never fall out. For the price, I'd definitely say they're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Decent Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Update : 5months very minimal use, Bluetooth started to connect and disconnect, can’t use it anymore. Again back to my old wired ones .. not good ..... ..........., I used similar sort of Level U headphones with noise cancellation in the past. these are not bad for the pricing, voice is good but sometimes you get distorted Bluetooth connection. Overall decent product
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Sharjeel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Sound & bass
customer_reviews.text: great great great price - I listen to rock, rap, and pop music and these have great sound. i have bose I paid $300 for and these sound the same and the battery lasts for 12-15 works outs of 1 hour each. I wear them when I run and they bounce around a lot but they do not fall off. They do side off when I do sit ups but for the price they are GREAT! I have got 3 pair because I forget to charge them. Will buy more if I lose these.
customer_reviews.author: Darin D

customer_reviews.title: My second pair and I love them.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair accidentally got crushed in a car door, and this second pair works just as nicely. I keep it powered on and use it intermittently throughout the day for music and calls, and on average it lasts three or four days! I only gave it 4 stars because this new one has a really loud vibrate motor, like it's loose or something. Other than that great sound quality, the replacement wingless rubber covers are much more comfortable for my ears, and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Hawkey

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds are terrible, indicators nonexistant.
customer_reviews.text: Worst ear pieces I have ever had, cannot keep them in my ears. Uncomfortable, and unreliable. Hard to put in in time to answer a call. Pairing worked easily but I cannot hear or know when they are paired at initial turn on in the mornings or other times when out of range or restarting for other reasons. I have to go to the blue tooth list on my phone to know they are connected. Switched to Samsung in hopes I would get a quality product. No such luck. Disappointed, waste of $25.00
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They tend to circle around the neck so if you move a lot for work or when using them they may not be ideal. Also be aware that if you stretch them to take them off over time the rubber is going to snap. They still work but kinda hard to stay on the neck when they have half an arm. Also, I just washed and dried my pair and they still work xD 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Chenoah

customer_reviews.title: Way better than wired
customer_reviews.text: I will never used wired earbuds again. These Bluetooth earbuds are good for wearing around anywhere and sound great. I do not recommend falling asleep with then on though, the rubber broke on my last pair which did not mess up the sound quality but it did make the sides that rest around your neck uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Shape of the earbud
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY ABHOR THIS SET ! This was actually the 3rd set of these I have had. The first time I purchased they were as a set of 2. This was to allow 2 people to listen to the same thing at the same time. That was great. They changed the shape of the earbud and they DO NOT stay in the ear well at all. They do not fit well in the ear canal, despite the fact they come with 3 different size covers. If you expect them to block outside noise, forget it they are not even bush league. WOULD I BUY AGAIN ---------- EMPHATICALLY ---NO, NO, NO!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for working out.
customer_reviews.text: These head set fall off very easy... All the weight is in the back and it barley long enough to go around neck which is why it always falling off or shifting to right out left... Definitely don't use or buy for your workout... Or running. The sound is ok for sitting and listening to music
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it Already!
customer_reviews.text: Sound: Clear highs, good minds, great low end Battery Life: Performs beyond expectation, it says 8 Hr listening, but this headset lasted well beyond an 8hr work shift of continuous max volume Quality: It feels solid and not cheap in any way. Comfort: Whilst wearing the headset set I tend to forget I even have it on. The active tips or wings tips keep it rock solid in my ear and are soft enough for me not to even notice. I highly recommend this set to anybody doing activities but still want great audio.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Well...
customer_reviews.text: I got these specifically for the shape of the earbuds. Normal earbuds hurt my ears or fall out and these are super comfortable. Great sound quality and comfortable to wear. Very pleased with this purchase. Edit: 3 months later: This is my second pair of these and each one has snapped on the right side where the neck band meets the control arm. Kind of expected better quality from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Hendel

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: The sound is correct for use in phone calls, not for listening to music. Easy to connect to the Samsung mobile, at the moment it does not link with anything else, we will see. The shipment was fast and good until the delivery man decided not to take it to the delivery point and left it at a collection point because he did so.
customer_reviews.author: Client

customer_reviews.title: Best active headphones I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: Best cheap headphones, I have owned. I bought the expensive Bose, Samsung, Beats and if you're actively doing house work, playing sports, or just working this are so good. They don't fall off/out, and you don't have to worry about dropping them or worry about carry a case when you aren't using them. They just hang on your neck very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Years in and it's still my favorite headset.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 2 or so years and they're still my preferred exercise headphones. I has a deformed inner ear that makes in ear headphones very uncomfortable for me and this earpboke design alleviates that problem. The sound quality is a little worse that the speed headphones from Samsung with the same design (the ones that came with the Galazy S6 and other models). But other than that, great device.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an older pair of Samsung yoke earbuds with the retractable speakers. These sound better and feel better and last longer. Really good when mowing the lawn or taking a call while at my desk and working with my hands. Wasn't sure if I'd like the earbud braces but they're pretty comfortable. I think the way the leads from the yoke to the earpieces could use a little work, but not a very big negative. Would buy again or give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Home Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I use these everyday. Th wind when im driving ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these everyday. Th wind when im driving on th freeway interferes with my voice to the person on th other end because this picks up a Lot on my end including when people are around me but much clearer than a cell phone. A.c. and Th heater will definitely be used so no biggie. I listen to music sometimez but honestly I would rather only use these for talking and videos here n there on fb bt have my spare headphonez for those momentz when im just listening to music or anything else to save battery. Th battery lastz a long time thtz just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Williams

customer_reviews.title: great cheap set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Second pair, other pair lasted around a year with daily work/gym use. Rubber earphone "covers" come off kinda easy and get lost so i ordered a pack of extras. Sound is pretty good for a "cheap" set of headphones, could use a little more bass but im over all happy enough to have ordered another pair. I listen at about 80% max volume and battery will last about an 8hr shift.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: I loved these at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first! Sound was decent, they fit my ears well and made working so much easier! However, I quickly learned that they do not make a good talking headset. People on the other end, on the phone and Skype type video conferencing, state it's really hard to hear you speaking. Yes, I tried to change settings to fix it, no dice. Then, the rubber started coming off about a month in. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Will crack and stop working
customer_reviews.text: Just trashed my 4th and final headset. All seem to crack in the same spot after a few months. Last one crack and would not turn on or charge. As much as I liked it with my Samsung phone cant keep spending the money. Moved on to try a Sony headset.
customer_reviews.author: iontb

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is subpar and the headphones died after only 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could trust this product since is was name brand, however, these were horrible headphones. I paid $30.00 for these headphones and they weren't loud enough, especially while running or at the gym. The earbuds frequently feel out of my ears and the earbud cushions fell off very easily. I lost two ear buds cushions over the course of a year and then they just stopped working after a year of infrequent use. Don't buy electronics from Amazon, they always sell the defective products.
customer_reviews.author: Cherise E. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Fix, please!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One for me and one for my wife. Unfortunately for me, it drops my calls! I thought it was something else but I tried and paired the other set and the same thing happened. Very frustrating. I have an LG that the left ear quit working so I thought I order this samsung since my phone is the same brand , but they don't work! I'm stuck for now using my right ear on my LG until I get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Strawman

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT block outside noise!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a headset while working. That said, these will never be used. The sound quality is good, but I can't deal with the fit of the ear pieces. They feel loose, like they will fall out, and they do absolutely nothing to block outside noise. I don't know how the call quality is since I did not have any phone conversations while I did use it. I much prefer the MPow Jaws headset.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality When Connected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my Samsung U-Flex headset died. The Level has good quality sound, both mic and earbuds. They are comfortable and the battery life is good. I talk basically all day and these will last a good 8 hours uninterrupted. My main complaint is that, unlike the U-Flex, these do not automatically reconnect to my phone when I get back in range, and I have issues when trying to manually force a bluetooth reconnection. This makes these so frustrating that I do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Almost 4 Months :-(
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes they sounded funny/ distorted but most of the time they worked great. Love how they go in your ear and do not have the ball at the end. However, I was disappointed that I've had them less than four months and they are already broken. Thought that they would've lasted longer than that. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in the first week
customer_reviews.text: This headset worked for a couple days and then stopped. I have contacted product support and waiting for a response. This is the third set that I have purchased. One set is still working, and the other two stopped, the most recent within the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: I love them, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had been putting off buying a Bluetooth headset for many months. I didn't like the earbuds that came on on them, and then I found these. I'm a diehard Samsung fan. I've been using these for three weeks. I LOVE THEM!!! They work wonderfully, are easy to use, and sound amazing. Now for the bad: This morning, as I was taking them off, the left leg broke off the headset. I'm so very disappointed. I've tried gluing the leg back on. It might work, but it doesn't feel very secure. Other than that, my only issue was the set slides back if I walk too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Bulbous, worthless ear-pieces
customer_reviews.text: Who in the world likes this type of ear-pieces? They always fall out. So frustrating. The cheap models with tiny, thin wires fit better, stay in better. Is this the best they can do? I suspect this set would work well if I could keep them in my ears!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Morales Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a couple of years ago and was using it daily at the gym 4 days a week. easy pairing, good distance reception love it. I had to buy another because the one I originally bought broke in my gym bag! I recommend this, comfort fir also!
customer_reviews.author: tabby

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad pair of earbuds. There are a lot of Chinese headsets on the market, but I feel more confident with a major brand. Sound quality is OK, I can't say I was blown by it, but we are not talking about an $200 set. One thing I don't like is that they are rear heavy and may slip from you neck. It happened to me once.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy... look for the LEVEL PRO version
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like the shape/design of earpiece. The odd shape didnt fit my ears at all. Had the level PRO version prior to this set. Much better style. Also the rubber cover that fits over hard plastic earpiece would fall off constantly during work. Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Roddy

customer_reviews.title: Ok Headset
customer_reviews.text: It can be used while plugged into usb power. The ear plugs do not go all the way into your ears. This reduces the available bass and allows more background noise in. It has a slider on\off button vs a push and hold button on my other head set. A slider is much better. After 4 months of use the range on the head set has gotten worse. The sound is breaking up within 20 feet of the transmitter. It had much better range when new.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, I shopped online on this exact site for headphones that I could use with my phone then, I bought this exact set. At that time they worked great and recommended them to as many as I could. The most recent set I purchased doesn't live up to my expectations. They look great, work good but the overall volume limit/level falls into what I personally think and believe is good ONLY FOR children! Adults, stay away. Especially if you are a music fanatic like I am.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this model again, when needed
customer_reviews.text: My first set finally broke so I shopped for comparable headsets. The ear pieces on this model fit so much better than the round buds found on all the more expensive models. I know now to be a little more patient when taking them off my neck since the hard plastic frame will separate if you pull them off too hard. Pairs exceptionally well w/my Samsung phone and my computer!
customer_reviews.author: Island Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Dissapppointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Samsung level U Bluetooth headset last year in September 28th,2019 and here it is June of 2020 and it has stopped working. First one side was low on volume, then people started saying that they could not hear me. About one or two days later I could not answer my phone with the Bluetooth and no one on the other end could hear me speak through the Bluetooth. I unpaired the Bluetooth attempting to reconnect and it will turn on oh, but it will not pair even with a fully charged battery.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Will not go into pairing mode.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 and it would not go into pairing mode. I replaced it and the second one went into pairing mode only once. I cannot pair it with any other device. It’s also small, the earbuds are uncomfortable and fall out of my ears. Returning this one too.
customer_reviews.author: JD Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how well it fits in my ear, I have small ears and most of the time the ear pieces are never fit. The sound is perfect and works great for phone calls. It arrived sealed in it's package. Last but not least....this is such an awesome color!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.text: I have had this blue tooth for 5wks and it has completely stopped working, stopped coming on and not pairing. I thought initially it was a good bluetooth but dont waste your money. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Rubber started pulling away from the hard plastic with in the first week. Now, after a couple months, the sides are just barely hanging on. The rubber on the ear pieces fall off easily. The battery life is excellent, but the durability just isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: short wires for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that the headphone wires are short. And the design of the earbuds are not a good fit for my ears, the buds hurt. I couldn't get them to fit sung. I tried the different cushions but it didn't help I'm disappointed with this purchase So I wouldn't buy them again unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: It's a cheap bluetooth headset that does the job
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it works. I needed something really cheap and wireless quickly (can't survive my train commutes without headphones). I use them on runs, although the design makes it so that it always slides off my neck a lot. Relatively tough, I'm pretty rough with my headphones and with this pair I just shove them into a rather tight messenger bag. Overall, it's okay. Don't get these expecting amazing sound quality. Biggest Issue(s): Sliding off the neck while exercising, connectivity issues when in highly populated areas. Pro(s): Cheap, durable
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Started out great but did not last
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for less than a year and need to replace them already. They started out great but within a couple of months part of the frame cracked. After six or seven months the right headphone has significantly lower volume than the left, to the point where the right side is basically useless. Not wort the money if they can't even work properly for a full year.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life ruins this product
customer_reviews.text: It is with great reluctance, that I have to say that this is a crap product. Sound quality is good, and design is reasonable. However, the battery life is absolute garbage. This is the second product of this type that I have owned, and the battery dies within four to six months. Also, attempting to get support from this from Samsung is brutal. Therefore I do not recommend anybody buy it. Please note, this is not a reflection on the seller. The seller was very prompt. and shipping and receipt was very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: I don't care for Samsung phones but I really like their Bluetooth with my iPhones.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my iPhone. Good sound quality, though like most Bluetooth, occasionally signal will break up if I twist or turn a certain way, but still better than most. Ear part fits comfortably though if you use the ones with the extra hooks, it makes it harder for the magnets to connect. Overall design works better than other over the neck versions. Did not slide around easily like some others, fitting snugly. Sound quality was good, and I could hear some outer noise which I prefer when walking around stores and if someone comes up from behind to walk past.
customer_reviews.author: Bro-Ken Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: The headphone are very nice and the sound quality is great. They are very comfortable and the ear phones hold in the ear. Tha battery life though is not the greatest, I am used to only needing to charge once every 2 to 3 days. These headphones about a day
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Update a month later
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have expired. My husband states after one day of working out, they no longer work. Now there is profuse static to one ear and the battery no longer holds a charge. I definitely would not recommend for anyone who works out or works outside like a mail carrier or package deliverer.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Won't last beyond 4-months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago and really like the product. The battery life is fantastic and I could use it in the office over an 8-hr day. Unfortunately, one ear bud isn't receiving the sound like normal, compared to the other side. Because I do like this product, I am reordering another one. UPDATE: Another 4 mos has gone by and my 2nd pair of headset is broken (again). This time, it's due to broken hinges where the rubber meets the plastic. With 2 purchases and both products broken at exactly the 4-mo timeframe, I will give it 2 stars. These don't last at all and it's extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom75

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the circle..
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are not nearly as good as the gear circle, the sound is great, the battery lasts , the magnet is weak at best when u pull them apart it doesnt answer the call when u close them it doesnt hang up the call the circle is a far better value, the u is not worth the extra money, very disappointed and I am a loyal Samsung buyer..
customer_reviews.author: dennis from jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and quality, downfall is that it DOESN'T connect to my smart Samsung tv. I only purchased this item being led on the basis of reviews that said it will connect to all Samsung smart TVs. The reviews to need to be screened and clarified.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelist kofi-jeff Steudler

customer_reviews.title: Works well but kind of quiet
customer_reviews.text: Quiet over all. But they fit perfectly and do not get in the way at all. I wear them in a clean factory and can hear my presses alarm with both buds in my ears. I hear the music just fine
customer_reviews.author: Insensitive

customer_reviews.title: favorite budget bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: for the price there's no way you could complain. are they as punchy as $100 headsets, no. does the battery last as long. almost. but the mic picks up really well, the sound is easily as good as wired headsets on the same price mark, and being able to hear the sound around you, while not being overwhelmed by that sound is a really nice touch. easily my favorite budget bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.author: hard-to-please

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality - mediocre physical quality
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and has a decent battery life. I was gifted my first pair and the only issue with them was that the piece that goes around the neck wasn’t reinforced well enough and broke. I purchased a second pair, observing that the style had changed slightly and looked like it would prevent this from happening again. However, my new pair is now broken on both sides where the silicone ends. This seems to be a design flaw. The device still technically works, but the plastic ends are not longer fully attached
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and returned them. My sons's old LGs broke and I was trying to save some money. However, we both equally didn't like the Samsungs. The sound quality wasn't that good and they fit awkwardly too. Spend the extra money and get the LGs or the higher grade Samsungs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barajas

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be returning these
customer_reviews.text: I’ll definitely be returning these headphones. The Bluetooth range is incredibly short. I lose connection if I put my phone in my pocket. It’s probably not the norm for this product they just don’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kikoman

customer_reviews.title: Not for big necks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a HUGE guy, but I'm bigger than average. Sadly my thick neck did these headphones in pretty quick. The sound quality and battery were great, and anyone with a small neck will love these, but bigger guys should probably stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Forbus

customer_reviews.title: Constant connectivity problems, fell apart within a month
customer_reviews.text: The hard plastic and rubber pieces started separating within a month of use. I kept using them occasionally for a bit, but they kept disconnecting from their paired devices. Windows, Android, Apple device - it didn't matter. It was infuriating. The headset wouldn't connect and it would take a half dozen tries to get it to reconnect. I just tried to use it again because I'd lost my two decent bluetooth headsets, and, well: I threw these in the garbage and found a pair truck stop 3.5mm headphones to use until I can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Bought two in the middle of 2017, only one survived
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these headphones, one pair for work and one for home. The home pair started to have issues right after it went out of warranty with the charging light burning out and having other electrical problems. Yesterday it stopped working. We're replacing it with a different pair of bluetooth headphones. The work pair is still going strong on 9 hours of use a day. Take a shot if you need a cheapish pair that should last a year but I wouldn't recommend them, based on my mixed bag experience.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I had the Samsung U Flex before and I was really interested in this slimmer design. The rubber bands that hold the wires down is a design flaw. Over all this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I am on my second pair (first pair got chewed by a dog). I use them EVERY day! I have even bought a backup pair! Sometimes they arnt loud enough for a crowded store, but other then that they are amazing. The mic is great, no one I talk to complains. It's been over a year and they are just now starting to show weakness in the plastic. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: kdixon

customer_reviews.title: not happy with this model...
customer_reviews.text: i use my device for phone calls only and my current has two features that this one doesn't have; 1) it doesn't answer the call when i disconnect the magnetic "click" i have to answer the call from my phone, not good when driving 2) it doesn't hang up when i "click" the magnet ear speakers. -The description said that it has 2 mic's but it only has one. -in ear features are very uncomfortable, ever heard "if it ain't broke don't fix it" Samsung if you designed it u screwed up
customer_reviews.author: avtar

customer_reviews.title: When it was working it had a great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this for everyday use but after a month it would shut off and on, disconnect/reconnect repeatedly while I was using it. The sound was good but it didn't last a month. Tech support was no help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mara L

customer_reviews.title: Best i have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 because it doesn't offer alot of features I have seen in other Bluetooth. It doesn't tell you the time left for talk time. It's just a basic Bluetooth. It charges really fast. If you don't like the way the others have the round ear buds and need something that fits your ears better...this is what you need. I have small ears and can't keep ear buds in. These are better than the Apple ear buds. Would I buy again. Yep. I don't even notice I am wearing this...much better than the one sided Bluetooth for car use.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: works fine, odd earbud fit
customer_reviews.text: Headphones work fine, battery lasts a while, but the earbuds have an odd fit. I can't seem to get them to fit snugly enough to where the noise cancellation would do anything.
customer_reviews.author: IVB

customer_reviews.title: Please with second set.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the the first pair (left side didn't work) Amazon had not problem sending a new set immediately. Since receiving new pair I have be pleased immensely. The sound quality it great and they are extremely flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth failure by Samsung
customer_reviews.text: These lasted about 2 charges and then required being plugged in to turn on. Now they have stopped working all together. Maybe 4 months old and probably 6 hrs of music....whats going on Samsung?
customer_reviews.author: soldierboy136

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Level U Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are HORRIBLE and broke EASILY!! The shipping was quick though. I do NOT recommend this item whatsoever!!
customer_reviews.author: Nia S. Adero

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound. Annoying gel caps
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for the family. All good except that I the gel caps come off frequently and its annoying.. I love the wing design of the gel caps they snug fit in my ears and sound quality is excellent. Would have given five star except for the gel caps. So, as a work around I applied little bit of glue to the gel caps and now they stay in place. nevertheless I recommend these...
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: They could have done MUCH better....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have Samsung everything and I figured it would make life easy plus I like my phone, tablets, watch and my last headset...but nope I was wrong! The bluetooth range sucks! They are comfortable but super quite and hard to hear if its loud around you. They are not balanced well so they do spin around and fall off some times. Overall was super displeased I gave them away to someone else and bought a different pair...I would not recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and finicky
customer_reviews.text: I broke one pair and replaced it, an earbud snagged on my wrist. Second pair's connection to Samsung Galaxy smartphone gets fuzzy/crackly when phone is in my front pants pocket. It works as long as I hold the phone in my hand, or put it in a shirt pocket. Same pair had a problem where I could get only minimum volume out of it, then it faded out to nothing. Not battery. Then mysteriously resolved itself after 3 tries at unpairing/pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Seller !
customer_reviews.text: First item was damage . Seller didn’t hesitate to send me a replacement. This is the best experience I’ve had on amazon! I appreciate the no hassle. Head set are amazing ! Battery life lasts me a full day! Highly recommend this seller !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my boyfriend, He needed something that wouldn’t get in his way and allow him to work an entire shift comfortably. He loves these, couldn’t be happier with this purchase. They are actually quite sturdy for how they look and feel. They are light and don’t weigh you down. They came with extra ear piece covers as well. Will definitely repurchase and order a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley90

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm nope
customer_reviews.text: Bad earpiece design. Just does not stay in ear where it needs to to get decent volume. Falls out easily. Tried all the configurations, best was reversing ear pieces using #1 pad in wrong ear.
customer_reviews.author: Leopold Scotch

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy but comfortable. Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones for people who don’t like the in-ear style. I prefer the Samsung U pro but these are a nice alternative. I also love the blue color it’s like a sapphire. Feel a bit flimsy but hug my neck very comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 or 2 before they are sold out, they are great
customer_reviews.text: The best value one can buy, over 10 hours of playing music or steaming per charge, light weight, very comfortable ear pods, turns on and off quickly, and rapidly connects to blue tooth. Definitely buy this headset before they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite type of headphone
customer_reviews.text: Syncs easily to any phone. Comfortable and good quality. When paired and turned on, it allows answering after one ring and it announces the callers name or number depending upon how you set it up. You do not have to touch your phone to answer.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Can't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I will dont recommend it. First it starte cutting off during conversation and broke twice in two months then stop taking charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Left one stopped working after a month!! There comfy tho; best fit pair I own. Just the left does not work anymore
customer_reviews.author: Cloud Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Short range. NO noise cancelling capability.
customer_reviews.text: I can't walk far away from my phone. I lose connection.... sometimes I'm charging my phone and I forget and walk away. The call stays on the phone but you won't hear the person talkingto you. The sounds is OK for me but the other person hears the wind when I walk in my yard. They can also hear the birds or my dogs barking. It picks up all the sounds around and not just my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Samsung's Hat Trick
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these before. They lasted almost 3 years and have used these while cycling in light to moderate rain many times. They have no noise cancellation but as a cyclist noise cancellation can be fatal. I like to hear music and my surroundings. The Samsung Level Us give me what i was looking for and mo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect, they come with eargels in various sizes so you're bound to find one that'll fit your ear. Sound is amazing, frequency response is great, they are very loud. Battery lasts pretty long and has a warning sound to tell you when battery is low, also the Samsung Level app can show you exactly how much battery is left. It is advisable to have a wired pair of earphones, it gets annoying when you wanna use these then you realize they're out of battery. But otherwise I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Very nice I had to buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair first one broke less than a month.Excellent sound quality for music and phone calls but materials could be in a little bit better (neckband) it can break really easily and not weather proof but it fit very nice on my ear it doesn’t fall
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Rivas Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great value, subpar quality control
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphone, I really do. The form factor is great, and the earpiece fits perfectly in the ear during workouts. The sound quality is fantastic for the price... BUT.... My first unit had malfunctioning buttons in 6 months, and my second unit had 2-3h battery life (faulty battery). I wish Samsung had it's s***t together on this one. Both times Samsung was good at warranty claims (used chat). Hoping my 3rd unit is good. Sigh..
customer_reviews.author: UMaaz

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: We actually own 3 of these. We liked them so much that when my son wanted a second pair of his own I knew exactly what to get. The sound is great on these and I like the fact that I can answer a phone call with a push of a button while working out at the gym. The charge lasts a long time also
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate microphone placement.
customer_reviews.text: There is a very unfortunate design flaw that places the microphone directly at the neck. So, say if you happen to be looking at your phone or down at anything at all, or even just leaning slightly left, you just muffled your mic! Sound quality is awesome though! Thicker wires, pretty durable. I have a tendency to break or put a short in headsets right at the right earbud. These look like they will hold up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene H.

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS DISCONNECTING CALLS
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7th or 8th set in about 5 years. Some times I get a great pair, other times I'm not so lucky. So with this pair, my calls are constantly disconnecting which is annoying asf. I also notice when I answer the line form my iphone instead of the ear piece it disconnects. The volume can be better, I have had louder pairs. I've also noticed this pair charges faster than other pair, I'm not sure how that effects the quality of the other issues... if you order these head phones be sure to get the warranty. They fit comfortably around the neck though.
customer_reviews.author: brittany neal

customer_reviews.title: Should be five star.  Just isn't, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: Charges quickly, good audio quality. They feel really nice when you're wearing them; I keep forgetting that I have them around my neck! I use them with my non-Samsung Android phone and they work fine. They should get four or five stars! But. They Simply Will Not Stay In My Ears. Not possible to get a good fit. Disappointed by that bit ... the most important one, I suppose. So ... a wonderful concept, but a not so great implementation. Unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: S. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life.....for the first month.
customer_reviews.text: These went from over 15hr battery life to less than 5 after 6 weeks. What will they be like in another 6?
customer_reviews.author: Todd

product_meta.title: Samsung Level U Bluetooth Wireless In-ear Headphones with Microphone, Black Sapphire
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingComfortable, capable and stylish - Samsung Level U is the ideal choice for high quality music on the go. Ergonomically designed for long term wear with large 12mm speaker units and active, dual-mic noise reduction ensures quality sound and ease of wear.
feature_bullets: 12mm Speaker Units deliver high quality, clear sound
Dual Mic Noise Reduction and Echo Cancelation reduce outside sound interference and feedback during calls
Features Magnetic Ear Buds for convenient wear when not in use and comes with 1 set of Samsung Active Ear Gels with stabilizing wings
Battery Life: up to 11 hrs talk/10 hrs play/ 500 hrs standby
Compatible with Samsung Level App and S Voice Voice Command

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars5,840 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Level U Wireless Headphones^3 sets of ear gels
